channel.title: RunePK || Oldschool || 459 look-alike|| Great Combat
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]RunePK[/size][/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bx3uT/34daa6ec5c.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W90aY2JifWA&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h3e8YVWXIIQ&list=UU6zUFrdZyRTfkQhHOW489Ug[/youtube][/center]
[b]General Features[/b]
[ul][li]Prayer[/li] [list] [li]protect items[/li] [li]Smite[/li] [li]Retribution[/li] [li]Redemption[/li] [/list] [li]Melee[/li] [list] [li]Accurate maxhit formulae - Thanks to Scu11(google)[/li] [li]Great accuracy / defence formulae's[/li] [li]All special attacks, including their effects - Thanks to Scu11 for some of the effects(google)[/li] [li]Poison[/li] [/list] [li]Ranged[/li] [list] [li]Accurate maxhit formulae, according to RS MaxHit calculator[/li] [li]All bolt specials[/li] [li]Correct projectile values for all weapons / arrows(Radios, slope, sH/eH, speed, etc)[/li] [li]All special attacks (Including slope, radios, etc) - Thanks again to Scu11, for the projectile values.[/li] [li]Correct hit delays, calculated by distance to opponent[/li] [li]In progress accuracy and defence formulae's[/li] [/list] [li]Magic - This is where it gets tricky[/li] [list] [li]In progress attack and defence formulae's[/li] [li]All modern and ancient spells, a few lunar spells(Vengeance, vengeance other, transfer special, etc)[/li] [/list] [li]Skills[/li] [list] [li]Cooking ( http://puu.sh/bjVcz/0d4f1661cc.gif )[/li] [li]Mining ( http://puu.sh/bjtiy/bcb6e54e93.png )[/li] [li]Woodcutting ( http://puu.sh/bjBhF/fd156aeaec.jpg )[/li] [li]Fishing ( http://puu.sh/bjANo/94c34f46f3.jpg )[/li] [/list] [li]Misc[/li] [list] [li]Consumables(Drinks, food)[/li] [li]Ring effects(Ring of Recoil, Ring of Life)[/li] [li]Warriors Guild(Animaitor room)[/li] [li]Prestige System[/li] [/list][/ul]
[center] [img]http://puu.sh/bjBzq/1124fdb717.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/bhhcL/abfee97fa0.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/bpkTZ/aa0914c079.gif[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/bqwh1/6425694296.gif[/img] [/center]

item.title: RunePK || Oldschool || 459 look-alike|| Great Combat
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

are you sure that is the 459 gameframe?

just making sure.

Good luck, was some good memories back in the day.
